thread.title: Justice Breyer Won't Sit Out Big Energy Case Where He Had Conflict Of Interest
thread.title_full: Justice Breyer Won't Sit Out Big Energy Case Where He Had Conflict Of Interest - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Justice Breyer Won't Sit Out Big Energy Case Where He Had Conflict Of Interest
text: Under federal law, a Supreme Court justice must recuse from a case when he or his spouse have a "financial interest" in it. Justice Stephen Breyer didn't know his wife held stock in a company with a stake in a big energy case the court
